title: Starting The Game As Your Capture Target
alternative_title: Cong Chengwei Ni De Gonglve Duixiang Kaishi ; Cóng Chéngwéi Nǐ De Gōnglüè Duìxiàng Kāishǐ ; Start by Becoming Your Strategy Target ; Starting the Game as Your Capture Target ; 从成为你的攻略对象开始
status: Cong Chengwei Ni De Gonglve Duixiang Kaishi ; Cóng Chéngwéi Nǐ De Gōnglüè Duìxiàng Kāishǐ ; Start by Becoming Your Strategy Target ; Starting the Game as Your Capture Target ; 从成为你的攻略对象开始
description:
Description :
        An ordinary college student, Lin Chao, accidentally got trapped in a game world. The system told her that she could only return to the real world if she was won over by the female protagonist and had maximum affection. Despite this, the system assigned her the role of a villain who would be eliminated by the protagonist right at the beginning.

“I have to think of a way, stickily cling to this protagonist…”

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: Dying At The Beginning Of The Game
